sentence.Network_en: The government denied the accusation that it was involved in the murders.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府否认了参与谋杀案的指控。

sentence.Network_en: This sounds like a barrage of accusation—I don'tintend it to be.
sentence.Network_cn: 这听起来像是接二连三的指责——这并非我的本意。

sentence.Network_en: The accusation is wholly without foundation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项指控完全没有依据。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French, from Latin accusatio(n-), from accusare 'call to account' (see accuse)

entry.def: If you make an accusation against someone, you criticize them or express the belief that they have done something wrong.

example.ex: Kim rejects accusations that Country music is over-sentimental...
example.tran: 对于乡村音乐过于感伤的指责，金表示反对。

example.ex: Another accusation levelled at the Minister is that he does not understand ordinary people...
example.tran: 另一个矛头则直指部长不懂得体恤百姓。

entry.tran: （尚未证实的被控告的）罪名，罪状
entry.def: An accusation is a statement or claim by a witness or someone in authority that a particular person has committed a crime, although this has not yet been proved.

example.ex: ...people who have made public accusations of rape...
example.tran: 公开指控强奸罪名的人们

example.ex: The government denied the accusation that it was involved in the murders.
example.tran: 政府否认了参与谋杀案的指控。

means.word_mean: 1. a formal charge of wrongdoing brought against a person; the act of imputing blame or guilt
2. an assertion that someone is guilty of a fault or offence;

sentences.sentence: "the newspaper published charges that Jones was guilty of drunken driving"

auth_sentence.content: What I want is the details of the accusation.
auth_sentence.res_content: What I want is the details of the accusation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What I want is the details of the accusation.

auth_sentence.content: But Konate said the military leader rejects the accusation.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Konate said the military leader rejects the accusation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Konate said the military leader rejects the accusation.

auth_sentence.content: Invited to expand on his accusation, he declined.
auth_sentence.res_content: Invited to expand on his accusation, he declined.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Invited to expand on his accusation, he declined.

sentences.en: an answer to a charge or accusation
sentences.cn: 对控告或指责的答辩

sentences.en: to be under an accusation of
sentences.cn: 被控告…，被指责…

sentences.en: to bring an accusation against
sentences.cn: 对…起诉，控告…；提出指控或指责，谴责

sentences.en: to deny an accusation
sentences.cn: 否认指控

sentences.en: to lay an accusation against
sentences.cn: 对…起诉，控告…；提出指控或指责，谴责

sentences.en: to level an accusation against
sentences.cn: 对…起诉，控告…；提出指控或指责，谴责

sentences.en: to lodge an accusation against
sentences.cn: 对…起诉，控告…；提出指控或指责，谴责

sentences.en: to repudiate an accusation
sentences.cn: 否认指控

sentences.en: to retract an accusation
sentences.cn: 撤销指控

sentences.en: You can’t just throw accusations around like that!
sentences.cn: 你不能只是那样不着边际地指责！

sentences.en: You can’t make wild accusations like that!
sentences.cn: 你不能这样胡乱地指责别人。

sentences.en: Your accusation must be grounded on facts.
sentences.cn: 你的指责必须以事实为依据。

sentences.en: You can’t make wild accusations like that!
sentences.cn: 你不能这样胡乱地指责别人。

sentences.en: There was a hint of accusation in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她的话音中暗含指责的意思。

sentences.en: A clear conscience laughs at false accusations.
sentences.cn: 只要问心无愧,旁人的指责可以一笑置之。

sentences.en: He poured forth a stream of bitter accusations.
sentences.cn: 他连珠炮般地进行了严厉谴责。

sentences.en: He resigned over accusations of favouritism.
sentences.cn: 由于被指责有偏心，他辞职了。

sentences.en: He veered between calm acceptance and hysterical accusations.
sentences.cn: 他时而泰然处之，时而歇斯底里地指责。

sentences.en: I was furious at his making such an accusation.
sentences.cn: 我对他的这种责备非常气愤。

sentences.en: She knew that no one would believe her accusation.
sentences.cn: 她知道没人会相信她的指控。

sentences.en: He fled the country amid accusations of fraud.
sentences.cn: 他身陷多项欺诈的控罪，于是潜逃出国。

sentences.en: Can you show good cause for your accusation?
sentences.cn: 你的指控有什么理由?

sentences.en: He is unlikely to make wild accusations without proof.
sentences.cn: 没有证据他不可能胡乱指控。

sentences.en: He made the accusations without a shred of evidence to back them up.
sentences.cn: 他提出的指控毫无证据。

sentences.en: He was very much put about by the false accusations brought against him.
sentences.cn: 他为对他的诬告极为苦恼。

sentences.en: New evidence has emerged which supports the accusation against her.
sentences.cn: 新出现的证据支持对她的指控。

sentences.en: The newspaper defended her against the accusations.
sentences.cn: 报纸为她受到的指控进行辩护。

sentences.en: He filed an accusation with the police.
sentences.cn: 他向警方申诉。

sentences.en: A clean conscience fears not false accusations.
sentences.cn: 身正不怕影子歪。

sentences.en: She denied the accusation completely.
sentences.cn: 她完全否认被控的罪名。
